platform_note: This dictionary is STRICTLY limited to strategies that actually exist in NHL 25 on Xbox One / PS4. No Wedge +1, Spread, or 2-1-2 forechecks are allowed.

defensive_pressure.description: How aggressively the team pressures the puck in the defensive zone.

breakout.description: Primary breakout pattern from the defensive zone.

regroup.description: Neutral zone regroup pattern after a controlled retreat.

fallback_behavior.explanation: If a strategy is requested that is not in allowed_values, treat it as a hard error. Do NOT invent or approximate using old EA games. If a strategy field is missing, automatically use the default value defined for that category.

architect_runtime.description: Architect must look up every strategy string in this dictionary before including it in a gameplan, matchup, or runtime snapshot. If not present, Architect should refuse the value.

dynasty_runtime.description: Dynasty GPT must never output a strategy that is not in allowed_values. If older EA terms (Wedge +1, Spread, 2-1-2, etc.) are requested or inferred, it must respond with an error / correction instead of using them.

archetype_engine.description: OpponentArchetypeMap_v1.0 must only assign strategies that appear here. If an archetype references anything else, treat it as a configuration error.
